crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE [ANY.RUN] Konni.APT Exfiltration"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:11; http.method; content:"POST"; http.uri; content:"/upload.php"; http.content_type; content:"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"; startswith; http.request_body; content:"fn="; content:"&fd="; distance:0; content:"&r=63"; distance:0; http.header_names; content:"|0d 0a|Content-Type|0d 0a|Host|0d 0a|Content-Length|0d 0a|Expect|0d 0a|Connection|0d 0a 0d 0a|"; bsize:60; fast_pattern; threshold:type limit,track by_dst,seconds 1300,count 1; reference:md5,cc4aeb24de3cf447f4902de124f61a59; reference:url,app.any.run/tasks/94d2285e-c039-4ae1-8fcb-debd62fdc096; reference:url,community.emergingthreats.net/t/konni-apt/765; classtype:trojan-activity; sid:2046820; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_07_14, deployment Perimeter, signature_severity Critical, tag Konni, updated_at 2023_09_01;)

alert icmp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Unusual PING detected"; icode:0; itype:8; fragbits:!M; content:!"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWABCDEFGHI",depth 32; content:!"0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv",depth 32; content:!"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE",depth 36; content:!"WANG2"; content:!"cacti-monitoring-system",depth 65; content:!"SolarWinds",depth 72; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-closer-look-at-the-target-malware-part-ii/; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-first-look-at-the-target-intrusion-malware/; classtype:successful-recon-limited; sid:29456; rev:3; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING Windows"; itype:8; content:"abcdefghijklmnop",depth 16; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:382; rev:11; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING"; icode:0; itype:8; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:384; rev:8; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Echo Reply"; icode:0; itype:0; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:408; rev:8; )

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Vasiliy Burov, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

values.CommandLine: reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v startsvc1 /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\Public\Documents\start.vbs" /f

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential Persistence Attempt Via Run Keys Using Reg.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious command line reg.exe tool adding key to RUN key in Registry

values.CommandLine: reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v startsvc1 /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\Public\Documents\start.vbs" /f
reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v startsvc1 /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\Public\Documents\start.vbs" /f

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.

values.CommandLine: reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v startsvc1 /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\Public\Documents\start.vbs" /f
reg  add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" /v startsvc1 /t REG_SZ /d "C:\Users\Public\Documents\start.vbs" /f

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of the "systeminfo" command to retrieve information

values.CommandLine: %WINDIR%\system32\systeminfo.exe
systeminfo
systeminfo
systeminfo

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis:
This indicator has been associated with the following threat activities: 

- The Konni APT group targeted government agencies and organizations in South Korea and the US using phishing emails with weaponized files to distribute the Konni RAT. The RAT gathers information, captures screenshots, steals files, and builds a remote interactive shell.

- A malicious LNK file disguised as an Excel file is targeting domestic financial institutions in South Korea. The LNK file downloads and executes additional malicious files, including a ZIP file and a CAB file, to exfiltrate sensitive information and potentially download additional malicious files.

gti_assessment.description: This indicator is malicious (low severity). It was detected by Google's spam and threat filtering engines, it was determined as malicious by a Mandiant analyst, it is associated with a Mandiant Intelligence Report, Mandiant's scoring pipeline identified this indicator as malicious, it is associated with a tracked Mandiant threat actor, it is associated with a tracked Mandiant malware family, it is associated with a tracked Mandiant campaign, it was matched by Google's curated Yara rules, it is contained within a collection provided by the Google Threat Intelligence team, or a trusted partner or security researcher and it was detected as a Mandiant malware family that captures system or network reconnaissance.
